Nicholas Ducharme-Barth joined the [Pacific Islands Fisheries Science Center](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/about/pacific-islands-fisheries-science-center) in 2021. Previously, Nicholas worked at the Pacific Community ([SPC](https://fame.spc.int/)) conducting pelagic stock assessments for the Western and Central Pacific Fisheries Commission ([WCPFC](https://www.wcpfc.int/)). He received his B.S. in Mathematics from the College of William & Mary and his Ph. D. in Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences from the University of Florida.
